entity.name: Victor Porton
entity.description: I am a mathematician and a FLOSS developer, with special interest in financing charity and science projects, foundational libraries, and advanced XML processing, as well as author's new methods in general topology.

projects.name: AI Internet-Socialism
projects.description: My app asks AI, what portion of the global GDP a registered user is worth (as a scientist and FLOSS developer) and gives him/her the proportional portion of donated funds. The AI decides the worth of the user by Web search related to his/her linked accounts. If a user creates several duplicate accounts, they are automatically merged. The app is protected from intruders by several means. The current version is Node.js-based and uses a custodial wallet. I am going to rewrite it as a fully on-chain ICP blockchain app to have a non-custodial wallet. The main intentions of the app is to solve the scientific publication crisis ("scientific coveries" - when something having been discoveried by a poor scientist remove the topic from publicity), that hinders development of science and world economy at least by several times.

projects.name: Algebraic Theory of General Topology
projects.description: A book with a generalization of general topology using ordered semicategory actions. All math heuristics show, that it is not less important than group theory, while group theory (discovered in 19th century) provides likely >1/2 of modern economy. The book(s) record my math results but is also structured to be used as a ready to study textbook. Discoveries also contain discontinuous analysis, that already has the power for engineers, physiscists, etc. to much simplify their computations.
